title: Taming Tamara
description: Tamara Pierce is one tough cookie. The daughter of a drug addict and an absentee father, sold by her mother as a child, and bounced from foster home to foster home as a teen, she’s been on her own since the day she was born. But after aging out of the system, her life takes a drastic turn for the worse when she finds herself desolate and alone on the rough streets of New York. With the harsh weather of winter right around the corner, Tamara knows she must find away to turn her luck around quick.Enter the sexy and powerful Mr. Cartwright — the ridiculously hot white heir to a fortune, and the owner of Cartwright Modelling Agency, with whom Tamara has a chance encounter. But when Mr. Cartwright invites Tamara to his luxury penthouse apartment she quickly learns he has a lot more on his mind than her potential skills as a model…TAMING TAMARA is a steamy 6800 word BWWM erotic short story, with a twist happy ending! This story features lots of descriptive hot sex and is NOT appropriate for anyone under the age of 18.
author: Ingrid Ash
